body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to CrystalClear Productions. My name is Matthew Nelson. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Tiffany Powell. I'm really nervous because the video quality I received for my project isn't what I was expecting.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that, Tiffany. We aim for nothing less than top quality, so I'll do my best to resolve this issue for you. Could you provide me with your order number and the date you placed the order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the order number is FIVE TWO EIGHT SIX, and I placed the order on March first.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Tiffany. Let me look up your order details... Meanwhile, could you describe the specific problem you're facing with the video quality?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the video is quite blurry and the colors are not vibrant at all. It looks like it was shot with a very low-quality camera.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, and I apologize for the inconvenience. We usually perform several quality checks before delivering. I'll investigate this issue immediately. While I do that, for verification purposes, could you also provide your email address associated with this order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Tiffany. I’ll start working on resolving the issue right away and will get back to you with a solution as soon as possible. In the meantime, is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that would be all. Thank you for your assistance, Matthew.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Tiffany. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. I apologize once again for any inconvenience caused. We'll make sure to get this sorted out for you promptly. Have a great day!
